hero.title: ARACEA
hero.subtitle: Sectoral Data Node for the Cement Industry
hero.description: ARACEA connects cement sector stakeholders in a sovereign data space, facilitating material traceability, ESG compliance, and supply chain optimization.

whatIs.title: The Cement Data Space
whatIs.description: ARACEA is the shared data infrastructure that enables the cement industry to exchange information securely while maintaining sovereignty over their data.

traceability.title: Material Traceability
traceability.description: Complete tracking from quarry to final product.

carbon.title: Carbon Footprint
carbon.description: Automatic calculation of emissions per product and process.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: Automatic adaptation to CBAM, CSRD and green taxonomy.

optimization.title: Logistics Optimization
optimization.description: Shared data for efficient routes and cost reduction.

forWhat.title: Industrial Use Cases
forWhat.description: Concrete applications already generating value in the sector.

cbam.title: CBAM Declaration
cbam.description: Automatic generation of carbon footprint reports for the border adjustment mechanism.

circular.title: Circular Economy
circular.description: Traceability of recycled materials and industrial by-products.

supplier.title: Supplier Evaluation
supplier.description: ESG scoring based on verifiable supply chain data.

benchmark.title: Sectoral Benchmarking
benchmark.description: Anonymous comparisons of energy efficiency and emissions.

whoUses.title: Ecosystem Actors
whoUses.description: Participants already part of the ARACEA network.

producers.title: Cement Producers
producers.description: Large cement plants sharing production and emissions data.

suppliers.title: Raw Material Suppliers
suppliers.description: Quarries and suppliers of clinker, gite and additives.

logistics.title: Logistics Operators
logistics.description: Carriers optimizing routes with shared data.

construction.title: Construction Companies
construction.description: Companies requiring cement with carbon footprint certification.

integration.title: Node Connected to the European Ecosystem
